data.title: TEDxMussoorie
data.meta_description: TED.com, home of TED Talks, is a global initiative about ideas worth spreading via TEDx, The Audacious Project, TED Books, TED Conferences, TED-Ed and more.
data.text:
Ashok Kumar

Director General of Police, Uttrakhand India

Ashok Kumar was born and brought up in a small village, Kurana, of district Panipat in Haryana. He received his primary education from the village Government school and did his B.Tech (1986) and M.Tech (1988) from IIT Delhi. He joined the Indian Police Service in 1989 and served in various challenging assignments in the state of UP and Uttarakhand. He was posted in Allahabad and Aligarh as ASP. After that as SP/SSP he was posted in various districts like Rudrpur, Chamoli, Haridwar, Shahjahanpur, Mainpuri, Baghpat, Nainital, Rampur, Mathura and Haridwar. He was instrumental in eliminating Terrorism from Tarai Region of Kumaun in the year 1993-94. He held the portfolio of IG Garhwal and IG Kumaun. where he worked towards humane and victim oriented policing. He also served as Chief of Intelligence and Security, ADG (Administration), and ADG Crime, Law & Order Uttarakhand. During his tenure as Director Vigilance Uttarakhand he started a major drive against corruption.

Harleen Sethi Upadhyay

Educationist

Harleen Sethi Upadhyay is a Educationist and specializes in Language Training & Personality development of Children. She holds experience in Corporate Training and Education Sectors. A Gold medalist in Public Relations, she has served over 350+ kids over a decade.

Kaushik Sarkar

Digital Transformation leader in global health and author of interdisciplinary sciences

Dr Kaushik Sarkar is a digital transformation leader in global health and author of interdisciplinary sciences. He spent his career harnessing the power of data to find new angles of viewing health security and access problems and designing strategies to overcome those impediments using disruptive tools and technologies.

Manjeet Jain

Chief Executive Officer, Education India

Dr. Manjeet Jain, founder & chairman of Education India is 'A visionary leader, educationist, entrepreneur & academician. He has been promoting educational and entrepreneurship sectors in India for more than a decade now. He has more than 100 articles published and featured in various print media like Times of India, Indian Express, The Hindu and many more. At present taking care of all together 300 plus schools, Dr. Manjeet Jain has been featured in Forbes India Magazine in November 2020 edition and has also been a speaker for the TEDx DandupurStudio event in 2021. He also holds the privilege of being a principal of President Awardee School in 2016. He also addressed the students and participants of a programme named ""Creating Entrepreneurial Organizations"" at IIM Ahmedabad, which had over 240 participants, including CEOs of various startups and IIM students. Best described as a man of vision and integrity, Dr Manjeet exemplifies the principles of work, knowledge, and dedication.

Preksha Kaparwan

CO-Founder and CMO

Preksha Kaparwan is the co-founder and CMO of super AI - which is focusing to simplify human-machine communication by enabling users to talk and resolve technical tasks through simple conversations. With a vision to create access to analytics for every user, Alphaa AI Democratising Analytics with ai-assisted data analytics. Preksha is a first-generation entrepreneur and has been working in the data analytics field for 10 years with her previous startup Real box, that was a Microsoft Biz Spark startup. B2B marketer and self-taught techie, and She have a richly diverse experience ranging from hospitality to AI industry. She is a Facebook sheleadstech alumina, WSP IIMB alumina a yourstory shesparks tech founder, was nominated for top 3 women founder of the year MEITY 2020, covered by Makers India, yourstory techspark 21 speakers, and has been named Linkedin Top Voice 21. She is also a Goldman Sachs 10000 startup alumina and is a known branding expert currently setting up her company.

Ravul Jindal

Director - Vascular & Endovascular Surgery

Dr. Ravul Jindal is presently working as a Director Vascular and Endovascular Surgery, Fortiis Hospital, Mohali. He has been working in the field of surgery from last 27 years and has been with Fortis since 16 years. His areas of expertise include peripheral arterial and venous interventions. Dr. Jindal completed his MBBS from Mahatma Gandhi Institute of Medical Sciences,Sewagram and MS in General Surgery from PGIMER, Chandigarh. He acquired a Diplomate in National Board in General surgery from New Delhi. After completing htis senior residency at PGIMER, Chandigarh,he went on to do his Fellowship in Vascular Surgery at St Mary's Hospital,London, UK. He also completed his FRCS from Royal College of surgeons of Edinburgh.

Sridhar M K

Experienced IT Leader

"Sridhar MK is an Thought Leader with an experience of 23yrs in IT Industry where he is fortunate enough to work with Organizations like FIS, HP & IBM. He started his career in IT as an Call Co-Ordinator and grown up to a leadership level where he is responsible for managing the IT Service Delivery for multiple Business Delivery Center. He strongly believes that fulfilling the business needs through IT enabled services is the Key factor for any successful business. He was instrumental in delivering many key projects and initiatives in his current role that helped organisation for the success which includes the IT readiness to work from home for the Business Delivery team during Covid-19 Situation. On time project delivery, Managing difficult situations, Understanding & fulfilling the Business requirements, Empowering the team and Being an Empathic Leader are key qualities that has helped him to succeed in his career.

SWARLEEN KAUR

Image consultant

Ms. Swarleen Kaur is the founder of Uttarakhand’s First Personality School, The Talk Room. She is a certified Youth Personality Development Trainer with more than 20 years of experience. “People took me as underdog who was just a teacher, I followed my Junoon to be an author, speaker, an educator by heart and soul . I see people do not understand what it means to have intrapersonal relationship first and how it develops their personality, but I have promised myself to change to create the awareness , Personality and public speaking is not a language , it is a skill and I swear to enhance the personalities of at least one million people before I quit this world. Let people be self aware, self motivated and self confident is my motto” Having worked as educator in various ICSE and CBSE schools, she understood where the gap lied which was rendering students incapable of reaching their utmost potential.
